main module¶

main.create_megaverse(api_client, goal_map)¶

Creates the expected megaverse based on the specified goal map

Parameters:

  • api_client (ApiClient) – The client to interact with the API

  • goal_map (dict) – The goal map that contains the expected megaverse

Returns:

A list of created megaverse objects

Return type:

list

main.main()¶

Main function to run the application

Retrieves environment variables, initializes the API Client, retrieves the goal map, and creates the megaverse.

crossmint-challenge
